participant_1.background:
I'm a writer who loves to tell stories about my favorite super heroes.
I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
i have many girlfriends.
I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors.

participant_2.background:
I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
I ride my scooter down the boardwalk until the wind blows away my worries.
I tried my hand at gambling, but I didn't have the stomach for it.
I paint my nails in different colors to match my outfits.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm a writer, and I just finished a new story about my favorite superhero.
That's awesome! I'm a stay at home mom, but I love reading poetry to get my creative juices flowing.
That's a great way to relax! I also love to play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
I love that! I used to play the violin, but I had to give it up when I had kids.
Oh no! That's too bad. I'm glad you're still able to enjoy music in other ways, though.
Thanks! I try to. I also love to go for rides on my scooter down the boardwalk. It helps me clear my head and forget about my worries.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going for walks in the park, but I've never been on a scooter before.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to get some exercise.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
